rukus.text: 26|123|Ādo (no min) mo, shito-tachi o uso-tsukidearu to shita.
26|124|Kare-ra no dōhō no fūdo ga kare-ra ni itta toki o omoiokose. `Anata gata wa omo o osorenai nodesu ka.
26|125|Hontōni watashi wa, anata gata e no seijitsuna shitodesu.
26|126|Dakara arrā o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai.
26|127|Mata watashi wa, kono koto de anata gata ni hōshū o motomemasen. Watashi e no hōshū wa, tada ban'yū no nushi kara (itadaku) dakedesu.
26|128|Anata gata wa kōchi to iu kōchi ni itazura ni ishibumi o tateru nodesu ka.
26|129|Mata anata gata wa (eien ni) sumou to shite, kengona kōrō o tateru nodesu ka.
26|130|Anata gata wa bōryoku o fuu toki, bōgyaku-sha no yō ni furumau nodesu ka.
26|131|Arrā o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai.
26|132|Anata gata ga shiru hodo no mono o, sadzuke rareru-kata o osore nasai.
26|133|Kare wa kazukazu no kachiku to shison o, anata gata ni sadzuke rare,
26|134|mata kaju-en ya izumi o mo sadzuke rareta.
26|135|Watashi wa anata gata ni kuwae rareru idaina hi no chōbatsu o hontōni osoreru.'
26|136|Kare-ra wa itta. `Anata ga sekkyō shite mo sekkyō shinakute mo, watashi-tachi ni totte wa onaji kotodesu.
26|137|Hontōni kore wa, mukashi no yarikata ni sotonarimasen.
26|139|Kare-ra wa, kare o uso-tsukidearu to shita. Sokode ware wa kare-ra o horoboshita. Hontōni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no ōku wa shinjinai.
26|140|Hontōni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukai okata de ara reru.
